import { useContext } from "react" import {FaTimes, FaEdit} from "react-icons/fa" import Card from "../components/shared/Card" import FeedbackContext from "../context/FeedbackContext" function FeedbackItem({item}) { const {handleDelete} = useContext(FeedbackContext) return (
{item.rating}
{item.text}
) } export default FeedbackItem
